alert.note: Alert for Ford; Grundy; Kankakee; Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:55AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Livingston, southern Grundy, southwestern Kankakee and Ford Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Odell to near Colfax to near Weldon. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paxton, Dwight, Fairbury, Gibson City, Chatsworth, Gardner, Forrest, Odell, Piper City, Braceville, Cullom, Saunemin, Essex, South Wilmington, Godley, Melvin, Roberts, Buckingham, Elliott and Sibley. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 204 and 232. I-57 between mile markers 258 and 263. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
